title: The Gal Is Sitting Behind Me, and Loves Me (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Early Romance   First-time Interc**rse   Genius Protagonist   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Strong Love Interests   Younger Sisters
author: Michinoku Koharu   陸奥 こはる
description:
Sandai Fujiwara, a bottom caste boy, has a backseat relationship with Shino Yuizaki, a top caste gal with rare good looks.

Physically, they are very close to each other, but because of the different worlds they live in, it is thought that they will never cross paths in their lives.

Until Sandai met Shino, who had stepped off her foot in a ditch.

'Thanks for the shower'

'Well, goodbye then.'

Although he lends Shino a shower on a whim, Sandai is wary that he can't trust gals. However, he finds himself attracted to Shino, who seems to be used to men but is actually not that good at them, and is still aggressively approaching him.

After some trouble, the two start dating, and begin to spend their days flirting with each other with a lot of sugar in their lives.......>
